sources.description:
British agent Philip Calvert (Anthony Hopkins) hunts modern-day pirates hijacking gold ships near the Scottish Isles. With backup from his eccentric boss "Uncle Arthur" (Robert Morley), he uncovers a castle-bound conspiracy where even the locals pack secrets.
